Events.Text: You have lost your debit card and before you could cancel it, somebody withdrew $300 at an ATM. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Perhaps it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
Hello.  I went and lost my debit card again.  Before I realized it was gone somebody managed to withdraw 300 dollars at an ATM.  Can you help me?
You are Sarah Brown. Your PIN is 1596, but you forgot your account number. (You might need your childhood pet's name for the security questions: Charlie.) [instruction 2 of 5]
Okay I will need your full name account number and PIN
Can you tell me your account number, please?
I forgot it.
I need your full name and date of birth
Could I get your full name, please?
Yes my name is Sarah Brown.
You forget what you are doing (imagine you're 93 years old and have some mental condition). [instruction 3 of 5]
and your date of birth
Could you provide your date of birth, please?
I'm confused I have forgotten what I am even doing right now.  I'm old and forgetful.
Keep this conversation going for a bit - you can be creative! [instruction 4 of 5]
Do you remember your pin number?
What was your mother's maiden name?
I cannot remember.  Getting old sucks you forget what you are doing all the time.
Okay what about your childhood pet
And what was the name of the pet you had as a child?
Now that I can remember.  My pet was Charlie.  He was a pet dinosaur.  That's how old I am.
What about your pin number?
Right, and your PIN as well please.
My pin is 1596.
What are the details for the fraud reports?
Could you provide a detailed fraud report now, please?
How do I do that?
Ok, great. Now bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 5 of 5]
Reason for your call?
I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you issue fraud reports.
Ok yes let's issue a fraud report.
I need the details of why you want one issued?
I need details so I can fill out the report
What other information do you need?
Reason for your phone call. What are the details of the fraud you are reporting
Can you provide the details of the fraud you are reporting
My name is Sarah Brown.  I lost my debit card and before I could cancel it, somebody withdrew $300 at an ATM.  My pin number is 1596.

Constraints.FraudReport: "lost debit card someone withdrew $300 before she could cancel it."

Events.Text: Is there anything else that I can do for you?

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
